BlazeGears.Form

A class that represents an HTML form in an object-oriented way.

Superclasses

BlazeGears.BaseClass

Dependencies

BlazeGears.BGTL

Summary
BlazeGears.FormA class that represents an HTML form in an object-oriented way.
Variables
actionThe action attribute of the form.
attribsA dictionary where the keys will be HTML attributes of the form.
elementThe element which the form will be injected into.
eventsA dictionary where the keys will be events of the form.
templatesA dictionary where the keys are the name of the templates and the values are the BGTL templates for the fields whose type matches the key.
textsA dictionary where the keys are the name of the text collections and the values are the text collections for the fields whose type matches the key.
Functions
createFieldAdds a field to the form.
createHtmlAdds a chunk of unescaped HTML to the form.
generateA deprecated alias for render.
getFieldFinds a field in the form.
getIdReturns the ID of the form.
renderRenders the form and injects it into the target element, if there’s one.
validateDetermines if the form passes validation.

Variables

action

action: ""

The action attribute of the form.

attribs

attribs: { "class": "BlazeGears-Form", "method": "post" }

A dictionary where the keys will be HTML attributes of the form.

element

element: null

The element which the form will be injected into.  It can be either an ID or a reference to an actual element.

events

events: {}

A dictionary where the keys will be events of the form.  The “on” prefix will be applied to the keys automatically.

templates

templates: {button: "...", hidden: "...", password: "...", radios: "...", select: "...", submit: "...", text: "...", textarea: "..."}

A dictionary where the keys are the name of the templates and the values are the BGTL templates for the fields whose type matches the key.

Notes

The form’s attributes, events, and text collection will be passed to the template during rendering.

See Also

BlazeGears.BGTL

texts

texts: {}

A dictionary where the keys are the name of the text collections and the values are the text collections for the fields whose type matches the key.

Functions

createField

createField: function(self,
id,
type)

Adds a field to the form.

Arguments

idThe ID and name of the field.  This must be an unique value for this form.
[type = “text”]Decides which keys the field will try to use from the templates and texts dictionaries upon generation.

Return Value

Returns the field object, if it was successfully created, else null.

Field Types

buttonCenter aligned button without a label.
checksA group of checkboxes.  Uses BlazeGears.Form.Field.createOption.
hiddenHidden input field.
radiosA group of radio buttons.  Uses BlazeGears.Form.Field.createOption.
selectSelect list.  Uses BlazeGears.Form.Field.createOption.
submitCenter aligned submit button without a label.
textSingle-line textbox.
textareaMultiline textbox.

See Also

BlazeGears.Form.Field

createHtml

createHtml: function(self,
content)

Adds a chunk of unescaped HTML to the form.

Arguments

contentThe HTML to be added.

generate

generate: function(self)

A deprecated alias for render.

getField

getField: function(self,
id)

Finds a field in the form.

Arguments

idThe ID of the sought field.

Return Value

Returns the field, if it exists, else null.

See Also

BlazeGears.Form.Field

getId

getId: function(self)

Returns the ID of the form.

render

render: function(self)

Renders the form and injects it into the target element, if there’s one.

Return Value

Returns the markup for the form.

validate

validate: function(self)

Determines if the form passes validation.

Return Value

Returns true if all fields of the form passes validation.

See Also

BlazeGears.Form.Field.createRule

A class that wraps all the functions from the BlazeGears namespace into a class context.
A singleton class that compiles HTML templates written in the BlazeGears Templating Language.
createOption: function(self,
id)
Adds an option to the field.
A class that represents a field of a form object.
createRule: function(self,
rule,
invalid,
valid)
Attaches a rule to the field.
